# Method dns_zone_delete

## Description
	Delete a dns zone

## Mandatory Input Parameters

## Input Parameters
	* dns_id: type: >0
	* dns_name: type: string, max length: 255
	* hostaddr: type: ipv4_addr
	* dnsview_id: type: >=0
	* dnsview_name: type: string
	* dnszone_id: type: >0
	* dnszone_name: type: string
	* zone: type: string
	* validate_warnings: type: enum, values: accept

## Returned Values
	* ret_oid
	* errno
	* errmsg
	* msg
	* severity
	* parameters
	* param_format
	* param_value
	* ret_code
